name: System Error
description:
This game was made for the 2019 Community Game Jam.

There will be a post Jam version as there were ideas I never completed

The Story (even though theres not a lot):

you wake up, having crashed on a unknown planet, the only problem is the planets slowly getting sucked into a black hole. Reality's are crashing and even your UI is messing up, your only way to safety is by collecting as many bolts as you can to fix your ship, some places are hard to get to, you will also find circut boards that you can use to upgrade your suit. Do you have what it takes?

Basic Controls:

A or LEFT_KEY = Move left

D or RIGHT_KEY = Move right

SPACE = Jump

E = Interact
